content: I feel like the first-round matchup between Harden and Westbrook will have a dramatic impact on how people feel about either guy winning the MVP in retrospect (as I doubt anyone except those two has a chance of winning this year). The playoffs aren’t considered when voting, but they definitely help reveal the strengths and flaws of a player during the season, which is one reason why I don’t agree with you about Barkley over MJ in 1993.
